title: Looking to create a team for Clash
body:
Hey everyone,

My name is Robin and i am looking to create a team of people who want to play league in a team environment and hone their skills together while participating in Clash tournaments when it reaches the live servers. 

any rank is wanted just leave a comment or add me on league (IGN: Kageyama Tobio) and we can talk about the details! if i get enough responses i will be looking to create more than 1 team based on ranks. hopefully we can all grow and become the best versions of ourselves! 

also i will be creating a clash club for like minded people if you want to join just let me know :)

thanks for reading!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: Hey Mizuro unfortunately you are on the NA server and i am on the OCE server so i cannot add you. hopefully you can find a team :)
dia 5 jg main, add me in game.
I'm plat 5, was plat 3 like 2 weeks ago back everything is sadly going downhill for me :( anyways my primary is adc and secondary is support
i have 4 people keen if you wanna group with us
